description: The past1000-solaronly experiment is a parallel experiment to the past1000 experiment. Instead of the complete forcing set, only solar TSI (Total Solar Irradiance) and solar SSI (Solar Spectral Irradiane) forcing is considered.
keywords: PMIP, Tier 2, last millennium, solar only, past1000-solaronly
long_name: last millennium experiment using only solar forcing
rationale: Determine what fraction of the variability is attributable to solar forcing and what fraction reflects purely internal variability.  Provide a longer-term perspective for detection and attribution studies. Investigate the response to solar forcing under climatic background conditions not too different from today.

requirements.description: Constant pre-industrial Carbon Dioxide (CO2) concentration. The CO2 concentration should be representative of Earth around the year 1850.
requirements.label: Pre-Industrial CO2 Concentration

requirements.description: Constant pre-industrial atmospheric concentrations of long-lived greenhouse-gases, including CH4 and N2O but not including CO2. These should be representative of Earth around the year 1850.
requirements.keywords: Pre-Industrial, Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas, WMGHG, No CO2
requirements.label: Pre-Industrial WMGHG Concentrations excluding CO2

requirements.description: Astronomical parameters for the last millennium 850-1850.
requirements.keywords: PMIP, orbital parameters, astronomical parameters, past 1000, last millenium, 850-1850
requirements.label: past1000 Astronomical Parameters

requirements.description: Constant pre-industrial (1850) land-use forcing. Land use should not change in the control run and should be fixed according to reconstructed agricultural maps from 1850.  Due to the diversity of model approaches in Earth System Models for land carbon, some groups might deviate from this specification, this must be clearly documented.
requirements.label: Pre-Industrial Land Use

requirements.description: Solar variability (TSI and SSI) in the last millennium 850-1850.
requirements.keywords: PMIP, solar variability, past 1000, last millenium, 850-1850
requirements.label: past1000 Solar Variability

requirements.description: Constant background stratospheric aerosol for piControl. A background volcanic aerosol should be specified that results in radiative forcing matching, as closely as possible, that experienced, on average, during the historical simulation (i.e. 1850-2014 mean).
requirements.keywords: pre-industrial, 1850, stratospheric, aerosol, background volcanic aerosol
requirements.label: Pre-Industrial Stratospheric Aerosol

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
requirements.label: AOGCM Configuration
